body.name: Amazon Brand - Mama Bear Gentle Baby Formula Milk-Based Powder with Iron, Complete Nutrition, Easy to Digest, 21.5 Ounce
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 27 - March 4 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: GENTLE ON TUMMIES: Mama Bear Gentle Infant Formula Powder is gentle on tiny, tender tummies, so it's easier to digest. Helps reduce fussiness, gas and crying. Compare to the nutrition of Enfamil NEUROPRO Gentlease

COMPLETE NUTRITION: Mama Bear Gentle Baby Formula is crafted with ingredients that help support brain, growth, immunity in a easy-to-digest infant formula; Complete nutrition for infants newborn to 12 months
BABY IMMUNE SUPPORT: Helps support immunity with vitamins and minerals; Mama Bear Gentle also contains DHA, a healthy omega-3 fatty acid, and choline to help support brain development
INFANT FORMULA POWDER: Just add powder to water; Mama Bear Gentle is an easy-to-digest baby formula for infants prone to fussiness, gas, and crying
NO ARTIFICIAL GROWTH HORMONES and non-GMO ingredients, which are not genetically engineered; Gluten free and certified kosher by the Orthodox Union – (U)D

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Q&A QUESTION: Is Mama Bear an Amazon private-label brand and does Amazon make the products? ANSWER: Yes, Mama Bear Infant Formulas are owned and distributed by Amazon. Amazon works directly with a supplier—a leading infant formula company—to manufacture Mama Bear Infant Formulas. QUESTION: Where are Mama Bear Infant Formulas made? ANSWER: All Mama Bear Infant Formulas are produced in Vermont and Ohio, U.S.A. Our dairy ingredients are sourced from one of the leading dairy markets, including the United States, Canada, and New Zealand. QUESTION: Are infant formulas regulated for quality and safety? ANSWER: Infant formulas are strictly regulated by the FDA to ensure product quality and safety. All infant formulas, by law, must meet or exceed the standards set by the FDA. QUESTION: What nutrients are included in infant formulas and what do they do? ANSWER: All infant formulas sold in the United States must provide complete nutrition for your baby’s first year of life, including protein, carbohydrates, fat, and appropriate vitamins and minerals. Infant formulas are patterned after breast milk. QUESTION: What’s new with Mama Bear infant formula? ANSWER: Mama Bear Infant Formulas contain the latest innovations in infant nutrition, including DHA, choline, lutein, nucleotides, prebiotics and probiotics. These include ingredients that are present in formulas because they occur naturally in breast milk.

Advantage Premium Infant Gentle Premium Complete Comfort Premium Sensitivity Premium Compare To Similac Pro-Advance Enfamil Infant Enfamil NeuroPro Gentlease Similac Pro-Total Comfort Similac Pro-Sensitive Description complete nutrition designed to be more like breastmilk complete nutrition that's closer to breastmilk (than our previous formulation) complete nutrition with easy to digest proteins for fussiness, gas & crying complete nutrition with easy to digest proteins for delicate tummies complete nutrition for babies with fussiness & gas when sensitive to lactose Easy to Digest ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ 99% Reduced Lactose (compared to our standard milk formula) ✓ Partially Broken Down Whey Proteins ✓ ✓ HMO Prebiotics for Immune Support & Digestive Health ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ No Artificial Growth Hormones ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Non-GMO ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great generic for Enfamil Gentlease
reviews.reviewText: Have ordered this multiple times because it’s so much more affordable than Enfamil Gentlease. My son had no problem switching to this formula. Have also bought the generic from Target, and this has a similar texture, almost more “sandy” I would say, but still dissolves into water very easily. Will keep buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Product for a Perfect Price!
reviews.reviewText: Attached is a photo of Enfamil Gentleease ingredients so you can compare them to the Mama Bear brand. It is practically Identical! I was able to swap my baby girl over with ease and no reaction. And now I'm spending way less on the same thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was struggling to find my kids formula and this was exactly what I needed! He was on enfamil gentlease and it was hard to find. Amazon brand is the exactly the same for a better price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a good formula for my baby niece though it did come in a day late from when I urgently needed it overall wasn’t bad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great as a replacement!
reviews.reviewText: My son’s formula is hard to find sometimes during the middle of the month so I came to Amazon and found this! Took him a day to adjust and now he drinks it with no problem. Now every kid is different but my son has had no issues drinking this formula! I love that there’s place to put the scoop so you don’t have to dig in the formula for it, that way it stay clean. I definitely recommend!! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just like the big brands! My baby didn’t even noticed I switched his formula! I got it overnight since I ran out, and it was here early morning! Thank you Amazon!🩷

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s formula… it’s thicker than I like, but it did help my son with his spit ups.
